title: [Large-scale] Challenge-based Social Innovation Project

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational social science theories and proficiency in digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Acquiring innovative approaches to solving social issues based on practical experience

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world social issues and derive three or more actionable challenges.
Learners can apply design thinking methodologies to develop solution prototypes and improve them at least once.
Learners can collaborate with team members via a collaborative platform to produce final outputs and complete presentation materials.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
